name: WalkNTime
description:
• For best results use Chrome or FireFox Browser.Double Click inside the Frame and move with the ARROW keys.
  • Your MOUSE controls what you see.. Up/Down Left/Right - Where your head faces the body will follow.
  • Press ESC to regain control of your mouse or exit Full Screen.
  • The Double-Arrow icon bottom left creates FULL SCREEN.
  • If images are not properly displayed your video card may not be supported. Try from a different computer.
